articles.author: Sam Fossum, Maegan Vazquez and Ellie Kaufman, CNN
articles.title: Biden mourns American killed in Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden expressed dismay Friday at the news that an American, Willy Joseph Cancel, was killed while fighting alongside Ukrainian forces.
articles.content:
(CNN)President Joe Biden expressed dismay Friday at the news that an American, Willy Joseph Cancel, was killed while fighting alongside Ukrainian forces.

articles.author: Laura Barton
articles.title: Arcade Fire: ‘America is rotten, but there are beautiful things about it’ - The Guardian
articles.description: After the high-concept hijinks around their last record turned off fans, the indie troubadours have gone back to basics with a rousing new album about Trump and togetherness

articles.title: American Idol Winner Laine Hardy Arrested - Taste of Country
articles.description: Laine Hardy was arrested in Louisiana this week. The country singer won Season 17 of American Idol  in 2019 and was set to appear on the show on Monday. #lai...
